attributes.action: give jade goody a mbe or obe for highlighting the importance highlighting cervical cancer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as we all know jade goody as terminal cancer. i am doing this as myself and loads more think jade should be given sum reconition for her brave battle against cervical cancer and she as made loads people come forward to go for a smear she will safe more lifes in death too

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
